title: Fieldwork-Based PBL Education for Strengthening Emergency Medical Technician Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic emergency medicine principles and fundamental resuscitation knowledge
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining digital device-based simulations with real-world field practice.

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate independent judgment skills based on patient-centered approaches across diverse patient scenarios.
Learners can apply collaborative decision-making processes in emergency medical care and community-based treatment situations.
Learners acquire practical skills to respond to real emergencies using digital equipment and field practice tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
